teacher_info.intro:
I am a native Chinese speaker. I teach for both Chinese and oversea students in a international school. I have some experience of conmunicating with kids and young people. i love teaching and i spent lots of time to learn how   
to teach Chinese. i also spent lots of time to improve my english and my french. cause i think that a good teacher must be now their students' language well.

Hello, everyone.I'm WanZhi, Wan means ten thousand, Zhi means wisdom.I come from GuiYang.the meaning of mu full name means a lot of wisdom.Maybe it sounds a little strange, but in fact, every Chinese name has its own meaning and it represents some kind of Expectations of parents for their children.In my free time,I like painting watercolor, watching movies and reading.If you are interested about those things too, we can also talk about them in the class.

I come from China. And I live in Shanghai-a beautiful and modern city. 
Chinese is my native language, and I can speak fruently English.

I have severial different training materials, I can customized the content to you.
I love painting; eating and play games. I'm friendly and easy going, we can talk like friends. If you want to improve chinese quickly, I can try my best to help you.

Hope we can have a great time in learning.

土生土长的中国人，可以说一口非常流利的中国普通话。

希望我们可以在学习中度过一段愉快的时间。

哈喽，大家好啊！我是来自中国的郭珺，哈哈哈名字是不是不会念啊，实在不会不要紧哦，你们可以叫我郭老师，很多中国人都不一定能把我的名字读正确呢
~Hello, everyone! I am Guo Jun from China. Hahaha, do you know how to pronounce my name? It doesn’t matter. You can call me Teacher Guo. Many Chinese people may not be able to pronounce my name correctly~
在大学我读的专业是英语，因此呢今后我会教大家中文，是不是反过来了呢？
I majored in English at university, so I will teach you Chinese in the future, is it the other way around
大学期间我获得了英语专业方面等证书，所以非常能够理解大家学中文的一些感受，这就叫感同身受吧
During the university, I got a certificate in English major, so I can understand some of your feelings when learning Chinese. This is called empathy.

user_info.nickname: Yamy 领事馆的汉语教师

teacher_info.intro: Hi My name is Yamy. I am a professional teacher of Chinese as a foreign language.  Now I am the exclusive Chinese teacher of the Consulate General and the Ministry of Commerce in Guangzhou, China. I am an easy-going, patient and punctual person!大家好，我叫雅美。我是一名专业的中文老师。我现在是中国广州市的多国领事馆和商业部的中文教师，为领事馆高管和其家属做对外汉语教学工作。同时我也在留学生学院担任中文导师，我教授过20多个国家的学生。我是一个容易相处、耐心、守时的人！

Hi! (∩_∩)I have been teaching Chinese since 2013. I have more than 4 years of teaching experience at a language school in Seoul. I can teach students at any level. I can help you improve your reading, listening, writing  skills and spoken Mandarin.

★LOVE&SHARE&ENJOY★

       Hello，everyone！I 'm a Chinese teacher with Mandarin Certification，I have professional teaching skills and a variety of learning materials to help you ：）
       
       I love travelling and making some vlog about daily life，life is fantastic~ If  you'd like to share your life or know more about Chinese culture，just talk to meヽ(￣▽￣)و

       我有三年的教学经验，帮助过许多想学习汉语的学生。无论你是汉语初学者，还是有一定基础的学生，我都有适合你的课程。

       中国文化博大精深，我认为学习汉语最好的媒介是学习中国文化。所以我的课程里面会讲到中国的历史、传统、建筑、艺术等与文化息息相关的内容。

       我的课程采取孔子提出的"因材施教”的教育方法和原则，所以对学生的学习情况我会分析和记录,并制定合适的课程，以确保学生能够学有所思、学有所获、学有所成。

       最后，我想分享给你一句古诗“未觉池塘春草梦,阶前梧叶已秋声”，学习是一个不断坚持的过程，所以我希望你能够坚持下去，这样才能够实现自己的目标✨~

Hi, everyone, I’m Manni, I’m a very easy-going, active and responsible teacher.
嗨，大家好，我是曼妮。我是一名非常随和、积极并且负责的老师。
I have been engaged in teaching Chinese as a foreign language for three years. I have an internationally certified teacher's certificate of Chinese as a foreign language and a master's degree in business administration.
 我从事对外汉语教学已有三年，拥有国际认证的对外汉语教师证书和工商管理硕士学位
I’m very good at teaching situations and topics. In my teaching, all of the resources come from real life or things you are interested in, so it will promote your motivation to learn, make it very easy to remember new words and sentence structure and inspire you to express your ideas in the lesson.

Hi guys! This is Paul. 
I'm from Zhenjiang, Jiangsu of China. I was born there, raised up there and still live there. 
Having lots of passion for language study, I became a denizen in Duolingo 1 or 2 years ago. Greek, Japanese, Norwegian,  French, and others became my family there. To learn languages, I got a habit and hobby of reading books, seeking for knowledge on Khan Academy, surfing on the Internet like Youtube. My favorite YouTubers are Nikkietutorials and Jeffree Star since I'm fond of makeup, beauty, and art. My major is Interior Design, so I often, frequently, constantly associate with drawing and painting. Listening to songs in minor languages is also my hobby.

Hi, my name is Aiwenli, a professional mandarin teacher, have about 16 years teaching experience in a middle school. I began to teach Chinese online since 2010. In total, I have given more than 4000 Chinese lessons on line.

- Animal lover
- A greenie
- Panda expert - used to work with panda 
- An experience overseas Chinese teacher 
- A people person 

Hi, I'm Stella, a native Chinese speaker currently based in China. Before the pandemic, I have worked as an overseas Chinese teacher for three years. 

 I am a people person and  I enjoy  meeting and chatting with different people from different cultures. Teaching gives me an opportunity to do it so I choose to be a teacher.

Besides teaching ,I'm  really into animals and environment protections. I used to work with pandas in the panda base for half a year, so I may proudly call myself a panda expert.Last year, I adopted a cheetah in Namibia.

Hi,There, I am ZhengXiaofeng. Thank you for booking my lessons.  From 1/15, I am going to increase the Chinese and Japanese lesson price one dollar. You can book lessons at the usual price until 1/14.  Please kindly check my schedule and book lessons,  I am looking forward to seeing you!  Thank you so much! 
  I come from China and now live in Japan. I am a native Chinese speaker and I can speak Japanese very well also. I have passed Level N1 of the Japanese-Language Proficiency Test given in July 2014. Recently I've been learning Korean and French.  So I want to share my experiences about how to learn a new language and help anyone who wants to learn or improve their Chinese or Japanese.

Hello there! I'm Vito from Zhejiang province, China.  I’m a native Chinese Mandarin speaker, English is my second language. I graduated from Zhejiang normal University and got my bachelor degree of economics in 2010. I got the CTCSOL （Certificate for Teacher of Chinese to Speakers of Other Language）which was certified by the Confucius Institute Headquarters in 2021. I have been working in global business field for more than 8 years, so if you want to learn some business Mandarin, i can do you a favor! I like movies, hiking, travelling and cultures all over the world.  I'm open-minded, please feel free to contact me.

My name is Jackie, I was majored in English at college, I could speak very standard mandarin with certificate level 2 plus. I have TESOL certificate and I could teach both children and adult. I have been a teacher for almost one year.
大家好，我叫周娜。大学时期我主修的专业是英语，我能讲一口流利标准的普通话。我的普通话等级证书是二级甲等。我拥有TESOL（Teaching English for speakers for other language）证书，并且当老师已经快一年了。

Hi, I am Liang. I'm from Beijing, China. Chinese is my native language, and I speak English too. I studied Language Interpretation and Linguistics in university and after graduation, I went to the US to work as an English Chinese Business Interpreter in 2006. Having stayed and worked in the US for 8 years, I came back to Beijing in 2014 and enrolled the Post-College Training Program for Teachers. From there, I graduated with the Certificate of Teaching Chinese as a Second Language.

In the past 7 years, I have been teaching Chinese both online and offline. Currently I do lessons on italki, and I also work as the top-star teacher for one of the biggest local language schools here in Beijing.

你好！我叫刘雨浓。我来自中国，现在在韩国。我非常喜欢跟来自世界各地的人聊天。我也很喜欢教中文和分享有趣的中国文化。我还喜欢听音乐，看书和写文章。在教中文的同时我还在学习英语和韩语。如果你也喜欢学习不同的语言，就跟我一起学习吧！Hello! My name is Liu Yunong. I'm from China and now I'm in Korea. I really like to chat with people from all over the world. I also enjoy teaching Chinese and sharing interesting Chinese culture. I also like listening to music, reading and writing. While teaching Chinese, I am also learning English and Korean. If you also like different languages, study with me!안녕하세요.저는유우농이라고 합니다. 저는 중국에서 왔습니다. 지금은 한국에 있습니다.저는 세계 각지에서 온 사람들과 이야기하는 것을 매우 좋아합니다. 저도 중국어를 가르치고 재미있는 중국 문화를 공유하 는 것을 좋아합니다.저는 음악을 듣고 책을 읽고 글쓰는 것 도 좋아합니다.중국어를 가르치는 동시에 저는 영어와 한국어를 공부하고있습니다.당신도 다른 언어를 좋아한다 면 나와 함께 공부합시다!

I was born and raised in Guangzhou, a stone’s throw from Hong Kong. I speak both Mandarin&Cantonese with standard accents,if you study with me you will have no trouble making yourself understood anywhere in China. I speak English well. I am learning Spanish. 
I left my job at AIG July 2018 to follow my dream, now I'm teaching full-time and traveling around the world. As someone with a passion for traveling, adventure, and languages, I've been to 23 countries(Europe,Asia,Australia,Middle east), also I've dived, skydived, paraglided and gone 1.5months long motorcycle trip. I love to meet different people and I particularly enjoy supporting my students on their journey of learning Chinese

Hi, My name is Jin Hong, I am a native Mandarin speaker from China. I have been teaching Chinese on Italki since 2016, and I have experience teaching students of all levels. I would love to help you improving your Chinese.

Hi, My name is Hannah, a native speaker of Mandarin, and I come from a small town in the Northeast of China.
I graduated from Guangxi University with a Master's degree in Teaching Chinese as a Second language (MTCSL). I am a qualified Chinese language teacher who has over five years of teaching experience in both Thailand and New Zealand. I am not only a Chinese teacher but also a language enthusiast. Currently, I am learning Thai and Korean. And this year, I start my P.hD study in Chinese language Education. 
I love reading, watching movies, cooking, Zumba, yoga, and traveling, and I am learning to play guitar myself recently. 
I look forward to meeting people from different worlds!

My name is Yenan Li, you can also call me Nicoletta in Italian. My native language is Chinese, and my hometown is in the north of China. I have obtained the Certificate of National Mandarin Test (Level 2, Grade A), so I speak very standard Putonghua without an accent. I can also speak English and some Italian. I have lived in Italy and Sicily for one year, and I have been to many countries and cities for my work. Now I live in Shenzhen, China, a modern international city.
